version_description:
- Dashboard automatically updates your balance on login
- Crash free transaction list. We fixed the random crash
- Fixed the pesky spinner that would keep on spinning on the transaction list

- Dashboard automatically updates your balance on login
- Crash free transaction list. We fixed the random crash

- Updated withdraw options inline with new fees
- Updated withdraw options inline with new fees
- We've added some cool empty state screens on Upload, Send and Withdraw to help our new users navigate around the app and get things done!

From 31st January 2018, you will no longer be able to deposit funds into your Skrill account using Mastercard® - please select an alternative deposit method.

You can still pay with Mastercard via Skrill directly at your favourite merchant websites.

From 31st January 2018, you will no longer be able to deposit funds into your Skrill account using Mastercard® - please select an alternative deposit method.

You can still pay with Mastercard via Skrill directly at your favourite merchant websites.

Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

* Get in touch with Skrill Help team easier - My Cases feature is now available under your user profile section. You can open a case, monitor its status and get a reply in the app. Call our support team directly dialling in the most suitable line for you.
* We are enabling ACH deposit via Rapid Transfer for our US customers.
* We are enabling mobile number verification when depositing with ACH for our US customers.
* We are introducing various stability and UI improvements.

• Visual and stability improvements
• You can now track the all time cost and profit for each currency in your crypto portfolio

Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

* Our crypto referral programme is live. You can now invite friends to join Skrill's crypto world and win some money
* Various stability and UI improvements.
We have fixed an issue with our contact section.

For your additional security and better usability of the app we're launching new 6-digit PIN which you will use across all your devices. We've also added Face ID support.
For your additional security and better usability of the app we're launching new 6-digit PIN which you will use across all your devices. We've also added Face ID support.

• Crypto P2P - You can now send crypto from your wallet to another Skrill wallet. FREE until the end of May.*
• Crypto Reserves - Select a fixed amount of your wallet balance to invest in a cryptocurrency each month.*
• Crypto Scheduled Orders are now available in EU countries.*
• We made various visual improvements to make your experience even better.

*Features not available to all markets.

Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

* Card issuer bank name is now available for your stored credit cards in the deposit section.
* Our US users can now complete ID and address verification via the app.
* Various stability and UI improvements.

Some of our users in Bangladesh reported that they are experiencing difficulties to access the Skrill app/site. If you are among them, please contact your Internet Service Provider for assistance on this issue.

Strong Customer Authentication:
- We will ask you to verify your mobile number as additional security factor for your account
- We will ask you to enter your account PIN when you send money to another Skrill user or when you withdraw money

As of 14/09, paying online with your credit card will begin to change thanks to the new EU Payment Services Directive 2 (PSD2). The PSD2 will protect you more effectively against fraud. What's changing? By confirming your identity in an extra step during payment, you'll verify that you're the one using your credit card. What this new process will look like for you depends on your bank.

Strong Customer Authentication:
- We will ask you to verify your mobile number as additional security factor for your account
- We will ask you to enter your account PIN when you send money to another Skrill user or when you withdraw money

As of 14/09, paying online with your credit card will begin to change thanks to the new EU Payment Services Directive 2 (PSD2). The PSD2 will protect you more effectively against fraud. What's changing? By confirming your identity in an extra step during payment, you'll verify that you're the one using your credit card. What this new process will look like for you depends on your bank.

When creating an auto order the user is able to block the needed balance for the order to be executed. In this way the user can be certain that he will never miss on a trading opportunity.

When creating an auto order the user is able to block the needed balance for the order to be executed. In this way the user can be certain that he will never miss on a trading opportunity.

- Users who have multiple fiat currency accounts are now able to deposit, withdraw and send money directly to/from a given balance.
- My cases: Attach files to an open case or capture an image using your camera
- When creating a Reserve the user is able to block the needed balance for the order to be executed. In this way, the user can be certain that he will never miss on a trading opportunity.

- Users who have multiple fiat currency accounts are now able to deposit, withdraw and send money directly to/from a given balance.
- My cases: Attach files to an open case or capture an image using your camera
- When creating a Reserve the user is able to block the needed balance for the order to be executed. In this way, the user can be certain that he will never miss on a trading opportunity.

Our Instant Orders have been extended to support trading our entire portfolio of cryptocurrencies against Bitcoin.
For users the features creates the following new trading pairs:
LTC / BTC, XRP / BTC, ETH / BTC, BCH / BTC, ETC / BTC, XLM / BTC, EOS / BTC, ZRX / BTC

The user will also be able to check his Portfolio recalculated against Bitcoin.

LTC / BTC, XRP / BTC, ETH / BTC, BCH / BTC, ETC / BTC, XLM / BTC, EOS / BTC, ZRX / BTC

The user will also be able to check his Portfolio recalculated against Bitcoin.

Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements

• A new asset is available for trading - Tezos (XTZ). It is enabled for trading against Bitcoin (BTC).
• Changes to the calculation of Profit and Loss.
• New metric Average Buy Price is introduced substituting the Net Cost and Net Gain. It will give the user the ability to make a quick decision if the current price is better or worse from the one on which he has acquired the trading asset.

• A new asset is available for trading - Tezos (XTZ). It is enabled for trading against Bitcoin (BTC).
• Changes to the calculation of Profit and Loss.
• New metric Average Buy Price is introduced substituting the Net Cost and Net Gain. It will give the user the ability to make a quick decision if the current price is better or worse from the one on which he has acquired the trading asset.

• You can now replace your damaged Skrill prepaid card directly from the app;
• You’ll start getting notifications when a merchant can’t accept payments with the Skrill prepaid card;
• We’ve added an explanation about the Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) to show you how to avoid high conversion fees when using your Skrill prepaid card abroad;
• We made minor improvements in our sign-up page, Rapid Transfer and Bank Transfer deposit options to improve your experience further;
• We made a key improvement, so you’ll no longer see a ‘try again later’ message when logging in.
Enjoy our latest update!

• You can now replace your damaged Skrill prepaid card directly from the app;
• You’ll start getting notifications when a merchant can’t accept payments with the Skrill prepaid card;
• We’ve added an explanation about the Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) to show you how to avoid high conversion fees when using your Skrill prepaid card abroad;
• We made minor improvements in our sign-up page, Rapid Transfer and Bank Transfer deposit options to improve your experience further;
• We made a key improvement, so you’ll no longer see a ‘try again later’ message when logging in.
Enjoy our latest update!

• We have released the Knect dashboard - those of you who have joined Skrill’s loyalty programme Knect can now access the new Knect dashboard and check out the different ways to earn points including any exclusive time-limited promotions. More to come soon.
Enjoy our latest update!

• Great news for our customers from the US and the US territories - you can now join Knect - Skrill's new loyalty program.
• We have deprecated the locked funds functionality in our Crypto offering. You will no longer be able to lock funds when you create an Auto Order or Reserve.
• You can now pay with Sofort when you send money abroad with Skrill Money Transfer.

∙ You can now unlock the "Pay Online" Knect promotion from the app.
∙ You can also choose to switch to small tiles which would allow you to have a quick glance at the Crypto market data and spot some trends and spikes.
∙ Those of you who use both Skrill's mobile app and their web account will receive interactive push notification on the mobile device and they can confirm or decline a login request on the web with a tab.
∙ Starting with our release 3.40.0, our app will no longer support iOS 10. As long as you’re on a newer version of iOS, you don’t need to do anything! But if you’re still on iOS 10, it’s time to update your iOS version, so you can keep getting the new releases of Skrill.
Enjoy our latest update!

You can now send money using a mobile number. Just import your phone contacts or type the number which you want to send to. If you still don't see the feature bare with us we're rolling it out gradually. As soon as it is enabled for you you will see a message on your dashboard.

We’re suspending trading in XRP as of 18 January.

We’ve made improvements and visual updates to make your experience smoother.
Enjoy our latest update!

• We’ve made visual improvements to our Deposit section to make your experience smoother.
• We’ve launched crypto trading for our US users. Now you can buy and sell LTC, ETH, BTC, and BCH directly in your Skrill app.
• We’ve added Cardano (ADA) to the list of cryptocurrencies you can trade in supported countries outside of the US.
• We improved currency formatting, so you’ll now see your balances, transactions and all other all other amounts of money in the way you are used to see it in all your apps. This depends on the country and language settings on your phone.
• Starting with our next release 3.60.0, our app will no longer support iOS 11. As long as you’re on a newer version of iOS, you don’t need to do anything! But if you’re still on iOS 11, it’s time to update your iOS version, so you can keep getting the new releases of Skrill.
Enjoy our latest update!

• We’ve made visual improvements to our Deposit section to make your experience smoother.
• We’ve launched crypto trading for our US users. Now you can buy and sell LTC, ETH, BTC, and BCH directly in your Skrill app.
• We’ve added Cardano (ADA) to the list of cryptocurrencies you can trade in supported countries outside of the US.
• We improved currency formatting, so you’ll now see your balances, transactions and all other all other amounts of money in the way you are used to see it in all your apps. This depends on the country and language settings on your phone.
• Starting with our next release 3.60.0, our app will no longer support iOS 11. As long as you’re on a newer version of iOS, you don’t need to do anything! But if you’re still on iOS 11, it’s time to update your iOS version, so you can keep getting the new releases of Skrill.
Enjoy our latest update!
